page.title: 18Local History
page.content: The people in this area are not really English or Welsh. In the past the area has been raided by Owain Glyndwr and the English (the Mortimers were often involved) with the local population suffering under both and perhaps not quite knowing with whom they belong. The situation continues today - the area is in Powys and therefore Wales but very few indeed speak with a Welsh accent let alone speak Welsh. Welsh is not taught in most of the primary schools and it is not possible to receive Welsh television - the area receives tv transmissions from the English Midlands.
